full_summary:
### Standing Offer - Electrical Services: Charlottetown Research and Development Centre
#### Solicitation Reference
PW-22-01006714

#### Tender Closing Date & Time
The submission deadline for this tender is October 17, 2022, at 2:00 p.m. (EDT).

#### Description
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada seeks to establish a Standing Offer with contractors specializing in routine and emergency electrical services for the Charlottetown Research and Development Centre (CRDC). This Centre is a major research facility situated in Charlottetown and Harrington, housing various scientific, agricultural, and administrative activities.

#### Scope of Work
The contractor will be required to provide electrical services, including the installation, removal, and repair of electrical systems, on an "As and When Requested" basis. The services will be required at both the Charlottetown and Harrington sites, which comprise the Main Complex located at 440 University Avenue and the Home Farm accessible via Mount Edward Road, and several buildings at 1200 Brackley Point Road in Harrington, respectively.

#### Site Visit
A site visit is recommended to familiarize contractors with the work site. The visit will be held on September 22, 2022, at 10:00 a.m. local time at the Commissionaire Desk, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada Charlottetown Research and Development Centre, 440 University Avenue, Charlottetown, PEI C1A 4N6.

#### Submission Requirements
Interested contractors must obtain the related specifications, plans, and drawings, and all other tender documents through the BuyandSell service provider's platform. Addenda, when issued, will also be available through this platform. A non-mandatory site visit will be conducted on September 22, 2022. 

#### Note
AAFC reserves the right to accept any proposal in whole or in part, without prior negotiation, and to reject any or all proposals received. 

#### Contracting Authority
The Contracting Authority is Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, and the Contracting Officer is Jean-François Lemay, who can be reached at:
- E-mail: jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca
- Telephone: 343-571-9706

[View Tender Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/09/be501522dbb05760af7c65fdee15c9
